tags: a court of thorns and roses
a court of mist and fury
body:
Series or Movie?

I may be the only one who thinks this, but… I’d much rather see Sarah J. Maa’s ACOTAR series turned into just that: a series, not a chopped up, rushed feeling movie that will no doubt compress all the marvelous, important details that made us all fall in love with the characters/story/romance in the first place! Movies are only what- 2.5 hours now? But a television/Netflix series? Think of the potential!

reblog.comment:

summary: I need more fancasts and fanart or Aelin built like a warrior. With wide shoulders and big thighs. A honed fighter like Aelin...
body:
I need more fancasts and fanart or Aelin built like a warrior. With wide shoulders and big thighs. A honed fighter like Aelin would probably not have the perfect hourglass figure with a slim neck and dainty arms. How can she wield a two handed sword effectively if she is the size of an underwear model?

Aelin is the strong , beautiful Queen of Terrasen lets not pretend she is anything other than what she is.

summary: High Lord Tamlin is basically Prince Adam aka Beast. Think about how similar they both are. They loved and adored their mom but...
body: High Lord Tamlin is basically Prince Adam aka Beast. Think about how similar they both are. They loved and adored their mom but died when he was young. Both men’s father was horribly cruel. Tamlins mother loved roses and he cherishes them dearly like Beast. Both had a big library where they liked to read and both are well educated. Tamlin has an ability to shape shifting into a bear-like body, wolf head with elk horns which is very similar to what the Beast looks like. Tamlin can turn his court members into wolves or glamor them like he did for Andras and Alis. Both had a heart made of stone. Both lock up a woman for selfish reasons and refuse to reason with her needs resulting in her hatred. However, Tamlins court is currently in ruins at the end of the books looking more like the beginning of the curse on Prince Adam when he became the Beast. So, maybe Tamlin will have a happily ever after if Sarah J Maas continues writing novellas for ACOTAR.

Both lock up a woman for selfish reasons and refuse to reason with her needs resulting in her hatred. Both men’s father was horribly cruel. Tamlins mother loved roses and he cherishes them dearly like Beast. Both had a big library where they liked to read and both are well educated. Tamlin has an ability to shape shifting into a bear-like body, wolf head with elk horns which is very similar to what the Beast looks like. Tamlin can turn his court members into wolves or glamor them like he did for Andras and Alis. Both had a heart made of stone. Both lock up a woman for selfish reasons and refuse to reason with her needs resulting in her hatred. So, maybe Tamlin will have a happily ever after if Sarah J Maas continues writing novellas for ACOTAR.

summary:
@faenet event: archetypes → martyr
Kaltain unleashed the last of her shadowfire, tipping her face to the ceiling, toward a sky...
body:
@faenet event: archetypes → martyr

Kaltain unleashed the last of her shadowfire, tipping her face to the ceiling, toward a sky she’d never see again.


She took every wall and every column. As she brought it all crashing and crumbling around them, Kaltain smiled, and at last burned herself into ash on a phantom wind.
